name: Hot Celestial Bodies
description:
Tired of being alone on those deep space journeys? Lacking a life partner for interstellar exploration? Feeling like those light years mean nothing without someone to share them with? Also, is your time at a premium? Well, at Lightspeed Dating we've got the package for you: 10 dates at 10 seconds each! We're even providing dating bios so you can skip to doing exactly what your partner wants (and hopefully not offend them by doing something they don't like). Terms & Conditions Apply, quality of matches not guaranteed, application fee non-refundable.

How to Play:

Try to satisfy as many of your dates as you can in the 10 seconds you have with each of them. View date bios by tapping on the tablet and using the tabs at the top to switch between bios. Find the bio that matches your current date and work out which activities will please (or offend) them. Activities may include: throwing away the candle/flower, killing the fly, ordering the correct drink, agreeing or disagreeing with them in conversation and destroying a block of ice.

Art by Ben Claxton & Holly Briggs

Code by Dan Hines & Samantha Keane

Made for Ludum Dare 51
